Articles.Content: Haven't played this game since 0.90. Is there a quick guide on the various UI changes (thought I saw something about being able to see aerodynamic forces while in flight?) and some little tricks that aren't obvious?
F12 can help you see aerodynamic forces. The tricks are that ALWAYS put wings on craft as they'll spin out if not, always remember a heat shield, and anything else you know.

> 
> F12 can help you see aerodynamic forces. The tricks are that ALWAYS put wings on craft as they'll spin out if not, always remember a heat shield, and anything else you know.

Thanks for the heads up! I've had an early career rocket flip out of control \*with\* fins, but fine without. Very confusing.
